title: 106_s884
content: Establishes as a nonprofit corporation the National Military Museum Foundation to: (1) preserve military artifacts having historical or technological significance, (2) facilitate research on military history. (3) promote partnerships between the Federal Government and the private sector for the preservation of such artifacts, (4) engage in related military history documentation and preservation activities. And (5) recognize and honor the individuals who have served in the armed forces. Authorizes appropriations.
